column4: I am using evolution, and I would like to delete the files from the server that I delete on evo, but I want to keep a copy of them on server. I was wondering, what effect would the "Disable support for all POP3 extensions" have on my email account
use imap if your server supports it , it sounds like what you need
is there any repository app that can help me get my files synchronized?
the problem is that the mail service I have only supports POP3
dont think there's an easy way to do it with pop3
